name: Demonball
description:
Beat 'em up without Punching Your Enemies!

The idea is to make a brawler where you can't touch your enemies, instead, you kick the ball and when it gains enough speed it starts to hurt the bad guys.

Don't feel bad about them, they are really really bad nasty demons, and your ball is actually a very special relic.

Made by Alex & Kate in the Room of Snakes
